```{r}
data <- read.csv('data.csv')
data
data <- data %>% mutate(vis = as.factor(vis))
head(data, 3)


```


```{r}
df.summary <- data %>%
  group_by(vis) %>%
  summarise(sd = sd(log2(abs(guess-trupercent)-1/8), na.rm = TRUE), error = mean(log2(abs(guess-trupercent)-1/8)))
df.summary

df.summary <- df.summary[order(df.summary$error),]
df.summary


```
log2(abs(guess-trupercent)-1/8)

```{r}
ggplot(df.summary, aes(error, vis)) +
  geom_errorbar( aes(xmin = error-sd, xmax = error+sd),width = 0.2) +
  geom_point(size = 2)

```
